articles.title: Brand builder I'm Web announced on the 15th that it has reorganized its "developer center" to expand..
articles.author: Wonho-seop
articles.summary: I'mWeb has reorganized its 'Developer Center' to streamline app development and registration for external partners using the I'mWeb API. This revamp introduces expanded API specifications and 'Webhook' functions to improve operational efficiency for mall operators and offers a better app launch environment.

articles.title: Papa Johns, Mountain Dew collab on new limited-time beverage: How to get it in Alabama
articles.author: Gabe Hauari
articles.summary: Papa Johns and Mountain Dew are launching a new beverage called 'Cini Dirty Soda,' blending Mountain Dew's citrus flavor with Papa Johns' pepperoncini. Papa Rewards members can enter for a chance to win a limited-edition kit containing all the ingredients to make the beverage, starting May 14.

articles.title: Samsung's $1,799 flip phone is slashed to just $1,235 and shoppers are obsessed
articles.author: Ariana Pezeshki
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Flip6, a foldable smartphone with features like FlexCam for hands-free selfies, a customizable FlexWindow, and improved battery life. It also offers Live Translate and Interpreter features for language translation, enhancing its utility for travelers.

articles.title: 31 Products For Quick, Easy Breakfasts
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article features a wide range of new kitchen products and food items designed to enhance the at-home breakfast experience. Products include a two-slice slim toaster, a 'Bread Buddy' dispenser, an airtight Deli ProKeeper, a SwitchBot Smart Switch Button Pusher, and a breakfast sandwich maker. Additionally, the article introduces Oxo's portable Cold Brew Rapid Brewer, Barebell's Protein Bars, Baby Brezza Formula Pro Advanced, Cinnamon Toast Crunch Cinnadust, and keto-friendly everything bagels, providing consumers with diverse options for easier and more enjoyable breakfast preparation.

articles.title: Veterans come together for 55th Eastern Iowa Honor Flight Wednesday morning
articles.summary: WeAreIowa requires users to download the WeAreIowa app to stream their content on mobile devices.

articles.title: 2025 Lexus LX price and specs: Luxury LandCruiser updates detailed
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Lexus is expanding its LX range for 2025 with the introduction of the Overtrail variant, an off-road-focused model available in LX500d or LX600 guise. Unveiled in October 2024, the Overtrail features include front, center, and rear locking differentials, 18-inch wheels with all-terrain tires, and a new Moon Desert tan/brown exterior finish.

articles.title: 2025 Lexus LX price and specs: Luxury LandCruiser updates detailed
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Lexus is expanding its LX range for 2025 with a new off-road-focused Overtrail variant, available in diesel LX500d or petrol LX600 guise. The Overtrail, unveiled in October 2024, features front, centre, and rear locking differentials, 18-inch wheels with all-terrain tires and new exterior finishes.

articles.title: 2025 Lexus LX price and specs: Luxury LandCruiser updates detailed
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Lexus is expanding its LX range for 2025 with the introduction of the Overtrail variant, a more off-road-focused model available in diesel (LX500d) or petrol (LX600) guise. Unveiled in October 2024, the Overtrail features front, center, and rear locking differentials, unique 18-inch wheels, and is available with a new Moon Desert tan/brown exterior finish. The 2025 Lexus LX range also includes updates like a 12.3-inch digital instrument cluster and enhanced safety features.

articles.title: Announcing the Launch of Odoo360 Technology Services Ltd in Ghana: Empowering Businesses with Next-Gen ERP Solutions
articles.summary: Odoo360 Technology Services Ltd has launched in Ghana. The company aims to empower businesses with next-generation ERP solutions.

articles.title: YouTube will use Gemini to place ads in videos.
articles.author: Mia Sato
articles.summary: YouTube launched a new AI-powered ad system. This system places ads in videos at contextually relevant moments. The announcement occurred at YouTube's annual Brandcast event for advertisers.

articles.title: Kidoz Welcomes Strengthened COPPA Rule as a Win for Families and Safe Compliant Advertising
articles.author: Access Newswire
articles.summary: Kidoz Inc. has enhanced its Kidoz Contextual Ad Network with new features and tools aimed at improving contextual advertising and ensuring child-safe online engagement. The Kidoz Ad Network offers features for children including relevant content discovery, engagement metrics, and ad monetization strategies.

articles.title: Sellers Catalyst Unveils Its Expanded Suite of End-to-End Services to Deliver Full-Funnel Performance for Amazon Sellers
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: An Amazon-focused marketing agency is introducing an expanded service suite. The new suite bundles SEO, A+ content design, PPC, product images, and account oversight. It helps brands achieve first-page visibility on Amazon within 90 days.

articles.title: New AI Platform DarcyIQ Automates Deal Flow and Accelerates Win Rates for B2B Services Companies
articles.author: Innovative Solutions
articles.summary: Innovative Solutions launched DarcyIQ, an AI revenue acceleration platform designed to shorten sales cycles and improve productivity for B2B service companies. DarcyIQ streamlines sales quote, presentation, and proposal creation by using AI to automate research, gather requirements, integrate with platforms, generate presentations, and provide real-time sales coaching.

articles.title: Drybar to Bring Its First Shop to Knoxville
articles.author: Knoxville Daily Sun
articles.summary: Drybar, a brand specializing in professional blowouts, is launching a new shop in Knoxville, specifically at 11681 Parkside Drive in Turkey Creek.

articles.title: Juventus reveal striking new home shirt for 2025/26
articles.author: 90min
articles.summary: Juventus introduced its new home shirt for the 2025/26 season. This unveiling presents the latest design for the team's official apparel.

articles.title: Nike's first ReactX Rejuven8 shoes sold out in minutes. Now, they're dropping 9 more starting at $60
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: Nike is launching a new lineup of ReactX Rejuven8 shoes on May 15th, including five men's slides, one women's slide, and three women's shoes. These shoes feature ReactX foam for comfortable wear and are available through Nike's Line Checkout System, requiring a Nike Member account for purchase.

articles.title: Ethical Web AI submits AI Vault on AWS Marketplace for Enterprises to Purchase and Install  May. 14, 2025 20:30
articles.summary: Ethical Web AI has submitted AI Vault, its enterprise-specific generative AI product, to become publicly available on AWS Marketplace. This allows clients to install and implement AI Vault directly from AWS Marketplace. AI Vault is designed to meet the needs of enterprise clients hesitant to adopt traditional generative AI solutions, providing a secure, private generative AI platform with complete control and transparency.

articles.title: I test appliances for a living, and the best handvac I've tried is a record-low $59
articles.summary: Craftsman has launched the V20 Cordless Hand Vacuum, now on sale at Amazon for $59. The lightweight vacuum features a 20-volt battery and is praised for its powerful suction, long battery life, and versatility in cleaning both floors and furniture.

articles.title: CORRECTING and REPLACING Well People Launches Mother's Day Campaign Celebrating 'Pregnancy-Friendly' Beauty for New & Expecting Mothers
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: The 'Glowing Mama Makeup Set' and 'Nurtured Skincare Set' bundles feature Daygleamer Mineral Sunscreen Serum and Lush Lip Tinted Oil. These products are intended for self-care rituals for expecting mothers.

articles.title: Walmart Is Selling a $407 Pressure Washer for Just $90, and Shoppers Say It 'Works Wonders' on Driveways
articles.author: John Alexander
articles.summary: Sugift launched the Electric Pressure Washer, now available at Walmart with a 78% discount. The pressure washer features adjustable nozzles, a detergent bank, and wheels for portability. Customer reviews highlight its compact size, powerful cleaning capabilities, and ease of use for cleaning surfaces like fences, houses, and driveways.

articles.title: This Serum Gives Me A Post-Laser Glow — Without The Downtime
articles.author: Karina Hoshikawa
articles.summary: Lenox and Sixteenth is launching two new skincare products. The first, The Laser Serum ($219), is powered by lactic, glycolic, and mandelic acids for skin brightening and resurfacing. The second, The Preservationist ($249 or $398 bundled), is a vitamin C serum-cream hybrid with peptides and vegan exosomes for plumping and firming the skin.

articles.title: Globe data center bags hyperscaler deal for Fairview facility
articles.author: By:
articles.summary: STT GDC Philippines is set to commercially launch its 124-megawatt data center in Fairview, Quezon City, with a global cloud service provider as its first anchor tenant. The company is also developing a 6-MW data center in Cavite and has launched AI Synergy Lab, a data center designed for AI workloads.

articles.title: Go1 Announces Rebrand And New Product Suite
articles.author: GO1
articles.summary: A leading L&D content platform has launched a new website with updated messaging. They have also introduced 'Go1 Learn,' contributing insights to encourage, build, and support employees.

articles.title: Netflix Says Ad Tier Has More Than 94 Million Users
articles.author: Alex Weprin
articles.summary: A streaming giant is planning a new advertising product. This product utilizes generative AI. The streaming company rolls out its in-house ad tech suite to support the new offering.

articles.title: The Hot Bot Officially Launches: AI SMS Employee That Revives Dead Leads and Drives Revenue in Days
articles.author: The Hot Bot
articles.summary: The Hot Bot, a US-based company, officially launched its AI-powered SMS assistant service designed to revive dead leads and drive revenue. This AI Sales Team uses precision-tuned AI SMS automation and sales frameworks to re-engage old leads, resulting in significant response rates and reclaimed sales for businesses. The Hot Bot's service integrates with CRMs and is offered as a done-for-you solution.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion Price & Specs (RI) – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Edge 60 Fusion, a smartphone featuring a 6.7-inch P-OLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 7400 processor, 12GB RAM, 256GB storage, a 50MP main camera, and a 5500mAh battery with 68W TurboPower charging. The phone is available in Mykonos Blue, Amazonite, and Slipstream colors, with a launch price of Rp 5,299,000 and a regular price of Rp 5,699,000.

articles.title: Mowi's new salmon burger launches in fresh space at select US Sam's Club stores
articles.summary: Mowi is launching its new Fjord Norwegian Salmon Burgers in select Sam's Club stores in the US this month. The burgers are made with responsibly farmed Norwegian Atlantic salmon and are available in multipacks exclusively at Sam's Club.

articles.title: You Can Now Book a Barber, a Chef, and... a Horse with AirBnB
articles.author: Ben Mesirow
articles.summary: Airbnb is launching its 2025 Summer Release, featuring a new offering called Services that connects users with personal trainers, chefs, and other professionals. Airbnb Experiences are being relaunched as Airbnb Originals, focusing on expert-led activities. A redesigned app will also support these new features and enhance user engagement.

articles.title: LaunchDarkly Introduces New Release Observability, AI Configurations, and Analytics ...
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: LaunchDarkly announced platform innovations at its Galaxy user conference aimed at helping engineering and product teams improve software delivery. The updates include tools to manage AI-generated code and mitigate risks associated with increased code volume. LaunchDarkly is enabling teams to innovate with confidence, respond to application issues, and improve user experience.

articles.title: Notable finds our editors are loving on Amazon from The Ordinary, Lands' End and more
articles.author: Audrey Ekman
articles.summary: Amazon has introduced several new products, including The Ordinary's skincare solutions, Twelve South's upgraded AirFly Pro for Bluetooth headphone connectivity, Laneige's high-gloss lip tint with a donut-shaped applicator, and Byoma's serum designed to hydrate and prime skin. Additionally, Olaplex has debuted a conditioner specifically formulated for thin hair, and a new hair wand has been launched for managing flyaways and creating sleek hairstyles.

articles.title: The best Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge cases
articles.author: John Lynch
articles.summary: Zagg is offering the Crystal Palace Lite case, which is a thin, durable, clear case for Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge. Spigen offers Liquid Air case for the same phone model, with minimalistic, matte-textured design and impact resistance. Otterbox also makes cases for the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge.

articles.title: Best Nespresso machines according to our tests
articles.author: Brigitt Earley
articles.summary: Nespresso offers two main lines of espresso machines: Vertuo and Original. Original machines use high pressure for a classic espresso experience, while Vertuo models use centrifugal force and barcode technology to brew a wider variety of cup sizes. The article highlights differences in technology, pod design, drink variety, and coffee flavor between the two product lines.

articles.title: Deal of the Day: KitchenAid's buy-for-life stand mixer is $100 off right now
articles.author: Cory Fernandez
articles.summary: KitchenAid's 3.5-quart stand mixer is currently on sale with a 25% discount, reaching its lowest price in over three months. This stand mixer is recognized for its durability and versatility, capable of handling tasks beyond just baking, such as making pizza dough, meringue, and shredded chicken.

articles.title: Samsung launches thinnest EVER Galaxy smartphone – claim FREE Pixel Buds3 Pro worth £219
articles.author: Ecommerce Tech Writer
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Edge, the thinnest smartphone on the market, and offering a pre-order deal including free Galaxy Buds3 Pro. Sky Mobile is providing deals on the Galaxy S25 Edge, including boosted data plans and double storage options.

articles.title: How Robot Pool Cleaners Are Revolutionizing Pool Maintenance and Swimming
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Beatbot has introduced the AquaSense 2 Ultra, an AI-powered 5-in-1 robotic pool cleaner, priced at $3,550 (discounted to $3,150 with a promo code). This product features AI navigation, 27 sensors, a remote control app, and a natural water clarification system. It also utilizes HybridSense™ AI Pool Mapping, adaptive debris detection, dual-side brushes, and an auto-parking system.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers going wild over ‘banging' bakery item that costs just 90p
articles.author: Courtney Pochin
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced Specially Selected Passion Fruit Curd Buns and chocolate buns, priced at £1.79 for a pack of two. Lidl has re-launched its Cheesecake Brownie for 89p and introduced a new Strawberry Cheesecake Doughnut for 79p, available for a limited time.

articles.title: Colazione da Zia: Italian breakfast comes to the Métropole Monte-Carlo
articles.author: Benjamin Godart
articles.summary: The Hôtel Métropole Monte-Carlo is re-launching its Zia pop-up restaurant, now featuring a breakfast service in addition to lunch and dinner. The culinary experience, crafted by chefs Manon Santini and Rocco Seminara, is also extending to external visitors, offering a variety of Italian-inspired dishes and revisited breakfast classics at the Odyssey area until October 1, 2025.

articles.title: TikTok launches latest accessibility tools, including AI-generated ALT text
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: TikTok has launched new accessibility features, including AI-generated ALT text for photos and a high contrast mode within the app. The AI-generated ALT text automatically describes photos if creators don't add their own, while the high contrast mode offers improved readability for users.

articles.title: Sky hands out huge freebie Samsung's newest mobile
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a thinner and lighter model in its S range. Sky Mobile offers the S25 Edge with a free pair of Buds3 Pro, while matching Samsung's storage offer. Amazon also lists the Galaxy S25 Edge, matching Samsung's price for the 512GB model.

articles.title: Personalized AI tools to help PHL businesses build consumer trust
articles.author: CEDTy Clea
articles.summary: Accenture Philippines has unveiled its new Client Experience Center in Taguig City. This center showcases how businesses can reinvent their operations using AI, cloud, data, and industry platforms, offering personalized AI use cases and advanced technologies. The center aims to allow clients to collaborate with Accenture to design solutions for increased productivity and growth.

articles.title: 5 Nigerian Haircare Brands That Understand Your Hair Like No One Else
articles.summary: Nature's Gentle Touch, founded in the 1980s, offers hair products using natural African ingredients. Toke Cosmetics produces natural hair, skin, and baby care products with African ingredients. Somma Professional creates salon-quality hair and skin care products, combining nature and science. Avila Naturalle, founded in 2017, offers 100% natural hair products. Amari Haircare provides luxury vegan and cruelty-free hair products made with high-quality African ingredients.

articles.title: How Warner Bros. Discovery is letting brands tap ‘newstalgia' for its IP
articles.author: Chris Kelly
articles.summary: Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) is launching new advertising solutions DemoDirect and Neo to improve efficiency and offering WBD Storyverse, a new initiative providing advertisers access to its IP for custom campaigns. The company is also rebranding its flagship streaming service back to HBO Max. These solutions are designed to maximize impact, improve transparency, and increase reach for advertisers.

articles.title: Beauty fans love new thickening spray that leaves hair 'looking visibly thicker and volumised'
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: OUAI has launched its Thickening Spray, a lightweight formula designed to boost hair volume and thickness, available exclusively on Look Fantastic. The spray contains amino acids, volume polymers, and amaranth peptides and is intended for use on damp hair before blow-drying.  Users report visibly thicker, lifted hair with lasting volume.

articles.title: Greggs reveals new menu with 9 items added
articles.author: Aditi Rane
articles.summary: Greggs has introduced a new summer menu consisting of nine new items. The updated menu, featuring savory delights, sweet treats, and wellness shots, became available in-store, via the Greggs app, and through Just Eat and Uber Eats for delivery from May 15.

articles.title: Nutella adds first new flavor in over 60 years with new spread – and it took 5 years to create
articles.author: Maya Lanzone
articles.summary: Ferrero is launching Nutella Peanut, a new variation of its hazelnut chocolate spread, in the US market, the first in 61 years. The company also plans to roll out Ferrero Rocher chocolate squares, Tic Tac Dr. Pepper, and Marshmallow Butterfinger, among other new products, to expand its US presence.

articles.title: Best Summer Skin Care Products For Men: Stay Fresh And Stylish Effortlessly
articles.summary: Nivea offers a moisturizing cream with licorice extract to fight hyperpigmentation and protect against UV rays. The Man Company provides sunscreen with SPF 50 PA+++, offering protection against UVA and UVB rays. Beardo introduces a body wash with arabica coffee and aloe for detanning and removing dead skin cells.

articles.title: NYC's Nan Xiang Express brings acclaimed soup dumplings to Houston area
articles.author: Erica Cheng
articles.summary: Nan Xiang Express, a sister concept to Nan Xiang Xiao Long Bao, has opened its first Texas location in Cypress. The new 'express' location features a scaled-down menu with xiao long bao, pot stickers, steamed dumplings, noodle and rice bowls. The restaurant also offers sides and drinks, and currently has 11 locations across the US.

articles.title: Corsearch Redefines Brand Protection with AI-Native Corsearch Zeal 2.0, Delivering Measurable Online Integrity
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Corsearch launched Corsearch Zeal 2.0, an AI-native platform designed to combat counterfeiting and online brand abuse. This platform introduces an outcomes-driven approach, providing quantifiable measures of online channel health and tools to neutralize threats, moving beyond traditional metrics like takedown volume.

articles.title: GoCable 8-in-1 charging cable and multitool on sale for $27
articles.author: Boing Boing'S Shop
articles.summary: The GoCable, an 8-in-1 charging cable and multitool, has been launched and is on sale for $26.99. It supports 100W charging, high-speed data transfer, and has connectors for Lightning and USB-C devices. It also features an LED screen for charging info, a magnetic wrap, a carabiner clip, a safe-edged cutter, and a bottle opener.

articles.title: The Nothing Phone 3 Goes ‘All-In' and Gets More Expensive. Think iPhone Prices.
articles.summary: Nothing, led by CEO Carl Pei, is set to launch the Nothing Phone 3 in the summer of 2025. The phone is expected to be priced around £800 (approximately $1,065 USD) in the UK, marking a shift towards a premium market segment compared to the company's previous models. The Nothing Phone 3 is positioned as Nothing's 'first true flagship smartphone' with premium materials and features.

articles.title: Do Ballerina Androids Dream of Electric Nutcrackers?
articles.author: Abigail Anthony
articles.summary: Tesla showcased its humanoid robot 'Optimus' performing dance moves, including ballet. Elon Musk stated that 'Optimus will perform ballet perfectly', implying future improvements and development of this new capability.

articles.title: Eufy Omni E28 Robot Vacuum Review: A Complete Cleaning System
articles.author: Brent Dirks
articles.summary: Eufy has launched the Omni E28 Robot Vacuum, a system with vacuum, mop, and portable spot cleaner. It retails for $999 and is available from retailers including Amazon and directly from Eufy. The vacuum features up to 20,000Pa of suction and the mop rotates 180 times per minute.

articles.title: nubia Z70S Ultra
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: nubia is introducing the Z70S Ultra smartphone. The smartphone is designed to be unconventional.

articles.title: The Nothing Phone 3 Goes ‘All-In' and Gets More Expensive. Think iPhone Prices.
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Nothing Technology Limited will debut Nothing Phone 3 this summer for £800, which converts to $1,065 USD. Carl Pei, Nothing CEO, claims that the phone will have premium materials, major performance upgrades, and software that really levels things up, marking it as the company's 'first true flagship smartphone'. The phone will be a premium-priced phone.

articles.title: M&S launches new £4 deal after cyberattack clears shelves
articles.author: Aditi Rane
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer has launched the 'Stir Fry Dine In' meal deal, offering a customizable dinner for two at £8. This promotion aims to provide value and convenience with various stir fry ingredients, including vegetables, proteins, and sauces.

articles.title: Why Sports APIs Are Revolutionizing Media - The Southern Maryland Chronicle
articles.author: David M. Higgins II
articles.summary: Sports APIs are transforming the technological infrastructure of media companies and betting platforms. For example, MelBet India uses APIs to enhance its live betting options, provide interactive dashboards, and offer stat-based predictions based on real-time data feeds. These APIs enable real-time updates and interactive features, enhancing the fan experience.

articles.title: Spar latest disruptor in SA mobile landscape
articles.author: AKANI CHAUKE
articles.summary: Spar Group has launched Spar Mobile, a virtual network operator (MVNO) in South Africa, in partnership with megsApp and backed by MTN. Spar Mobile enables shoppers to earn free data by shopping in-store and purchasing promotional products. The service aims to lower monthly data costs by up to 50%, with SIM cards costing R15 and including 300MB data and R10 airtime.

articles.title: Alphabet's Wing, DoorDash bringing drone deliveries to Charlotte
articles.summary: Alphabet's Wing and DoorDash are launching a new drone delivery service in Charlotte. The service will deliver items like matcha lattes and medicine to local residents.

articles.title: Oyo launches export-ready food products
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Oyo state government launched export-ready, value-added food products. These products are aimed at boosting agro-industrialization and expanding the state's footprint in regional and continental trade.

articles.title: CleanCore Solutions, Inc. (ZONE) Achieves 77.7% Year-Over-Year Revenue Growth for the Third ...
articles.author: Cleancore Solutions
articles.summary: CleanCore Solutions launched its new service, UVC Mobile Surface Disinfection, which is designed to provide effective disinfection using mobile units. The service aims to reduce pathogens in various settings, enhancing the overall cleaning strategy offered by CleanCore Solutions.

articles.title: Sandisk launches WD_BLACK SN8100 as ‘world's fastest PCIe Gen 5.0 NVMe SSD'
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: SanDisk has launched the WD_BLACK SN8100 NVMe SSD, a PCIe Gen 5.0 internal solid-state drive designed for high-performance applications. The SSD is available in 1TB, 2TB, and 4TB capacities, with an 8TB option expected later, and a heatsink version will be available in the fall. It boasts read speeds up to 14,900 MBps and write speeds up to 14,000 MBps, incorporating SanDisk's BiCS8 TLC 3D CBA NAND technology.

articles.title: Coca-Cola brings viral take on iconic soda to stores
articles.author: Daniel Kline
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is launching Sprite Tea in stores on May 20, inspired by a viral trend. The product will be available in 20-ounce bottles, cans, and 12-ounce can 12-packs, with sugar and sugar-free options for cans and sugar-only for bottles. Additionally, Coca-Cola's Orange Cream flavor has generated $50 million in retail sales, and they've launched Simply Pop, a prebiotic soda.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S26: Too early to talk about it but here is what it should bring
articles.summary: Rumors suggest the Samsung Galaxy S26 series may feature camera enhancements, potentially including improved optics and a variable aperture. The Exynos 2600 chip could offer better performance, and new silicon-carbon battery technology might improve battery life. There are also potential design changes, including a possible relocation of the S Pen and the introduction of a new 'Edge' model.

articles.title: Aldi launches incredible Burberry fragrance dupe just in time for Father's Day – and it will save you £130
articles.author: Katy Pagan
articles.summary: Aldi is launching new luxury Lacura fragrance dupes for Father's Day, inspired by Burberry, Givenchy, and Hugo Boss, priced at £6.99 each. The Iconic Man Eau de Parfum is a dupe for Burberry Hero, Ambition Eau de Parfum is similar to Givenchy Gentleman Society, and Island Oasis Eau de Parfum mirrors Hugo Boss Bottled Pacific.

articles.title: I Tested Nova AI for Video Editing: Heres My Honest Take
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Nova AI offers a chatbot service with GPT-4, Claude, and Gemini. The free version has limitations with prompt usage, and image generation is exclusive to the Pro version.

articles.title: Chowdeck launches in Ghana with customer reward and rider training scheme
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Chowdeck, a Nigerian delivery startup, has launched its service in Ghana. The launch includes a customer referral scheme, a tiered reward system, and an extensive rider training programme.

articles.title: Tensor9 helps vendors deploy their software into any environment using digital twins
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak
articles.summary: Tensor9 launched in 2024, offering a service that converts software vendors' code for deployment into customers' tech environments. It creates digital twins of deployed software, enabling customers to monitor software performance. The company recently raised a $4 million seed round to expand its technology and customer base.

articles.title: Tensor9 helps vendors deploy their software into any environment using digital twins
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Tensor9 offers a service that converts software vendor code for deployment into a customer's tech environment. This deployment process includes creating a digital twin for remote monitoring. The service caters to companies, like those in the financial sector, that need to deploy software without sending sensitive data to third parties.

articles.title: Premio Adds Support for NVIDIA JetPack 6.2 SDK with a Huge AI Performance Upgrade in JCO Series Rugged Edge PCs
articles.summary: Premio Inc. announces support for NVIDIA JetPack 6.2 SDK across its JCO Series of fanless edge AI computers, which support NVIDIA Jetson Orin Nano and NX modules. The JetPack 6.2 SDK release for the JCO Series features three scalable models: JCO-6000-ORN (AGX Orin), JCO-3000-ORN (NX/Nano), and JCO-1000-ORN (NX/Nano) with key benefits including support for super modes that deliver up to 2x the generative AI performance and up to 70% increase in AI TOPS from its predecessor release.

articles.title: Stanton Optical Grand Opening in Niagara Falls
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Stanton Optical is celebrating the grand opening of its Niagara Falls location. The company aims to provide easy, accessible, and affordable eye care and introduces Stan the Penguin as its brand ambassador.

articles.title: Lidl's £10 garden gadget will help keep insects away this summer
articles.author: Georgia Burns
articles.summary: Lidl has launched the Livarno Home Cylindrical Electric Insect Killer, priced at £9.99, designed to protect outdoor spaces from insects. Available in stores from May 15th, this device features low energy consumption, a removable tray for easy cleaning, a practical hanger, and a three-year warranty.

articles.title: The Air-Up claims to help you quit sugary drinks – I tried it to see if it works
articles.author: Emilie Lavinia
articles.summary: Air-Up introduced the Gen 2 bottle using Scentaste technology to flavor water through scent. The company offers flavor pods, including kola, watermelon, and iced coffee, available individually or via subscription. Air-Up also sells a steel version of its bottle.

articles.title: Oyo unveils export-ready food products
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Oyo State Government launched export-ready, value-added food products. This initiative aims to boost agro-industrialisation and expand the state's trade footprint.

articles.title: Nigerias new crude blend, Obodo, enters market
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: The Nigerian Upstream Petroleum Regulatory Commission announced the introduction of a new crude blend named Obodo. The first cargo of Obodo crude has been shipped, marking its launch in the market.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: Sky Mobile launches cheapest UK deal with free Buds
articles.author: The Scotsman
articles.summary: Sky Mobile has launched a new contract deal for the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge. The deal features double storage, no upfront cost, and includes free Buds Pro.

articles.title: SanDisk Launches Faster, Smarter Storage For Power Users
articles.author: New Telegraph
articles.summary: SanDisk has launched the WD_BLACK SN8100 NVMe SSD, a high-performance internal storage solution. This new drive utilizes PCIe Gen 5.0 technology, providing read speeds up to 14,900 MB/s and storage capacities reaching 8TB.

articles.title: "The opportunity to help customers has changed dramatically because of AI"
articles.author: Maayan Manela
articles.summary: HoneyBook has been integrating AI into its platform over the past two years, introducing features focused on writing and summarizing text.  They've expanded their AI capabilities to assist with pricing services, leveraging increased user trust and technological advancements to provide more value to small businesses.

articles.title: Julia Fox and Lourdes 'Lola' Leon join forces for new 'sensual' body care brand
articles.author: Bang Showbiz
articles.summary: Mienne, a new California-based body care brand, has launched a line of products focused on sensuality, including a Sex Serum ($55), body wash ($55), body creme ($85), and body serum ($75). The brand is initially available at Mienne.com, with plans to expand to Rescue Spa and Revolve before an international launch this summer.

articles.title: 32 Useful Products To Manage Adult Responsibilities
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The article features several new product introductions, including a fragrance-free CeraVe under-eye cream with ceramides and hyaluronic acid, The Pink Stuff's new "Sqeezy" cleaning set, Dr. Scholl's heel repair balm and foot masks, a Revlon one-step hair dryer and volumizer, and a NutriBullet baby food system. These products range from beauty and cleaning supplies to personal care items and baby food preparation, each designed to improve efficiency or address specific needs.

articles.title: Beauty Editors Try Mikayla Nogueira's Point of View Beauty
articles.author: Jasmine Hyman
articles.summary: Point of View (POV) Beauty, founded by Mikayla Nogueira, launched a line of skin prep products including primers, moisturizers, and lip gloss which quickly sold out after its initial launch in March. The products are now back in stock and have garnered positive reviews for their effectiveness in enhancing makeup application and providing skin nourishment, specifically highlighting the Drip It serum, Glaze It primer, and Amp It lip gloss.

articles.title: Asda announces new 'George' fashion shop opened by Spice Girl Mel B
articles.author: Hannah Ahmed
articles.summary: Asda has launched its first 'George' concept store in Leeds, dedicated to its fashion branch. The store features expanded collections, collaborations, and an upgraded shopping experience. The opening event included a celebrity appearance and customer engagement activities.

articles.title: Navigating the WriteMyEssay Platform: A User-Friendly Experience
articles.author: Sponsored Content
articles.summary: WriteMyEssay is introduced as an online writing service connecting students with experienced writers for academic needs. The service offers various features such as easy account creation, order placement for different types of papers with flexible deadlines, interaction with writers through profiles, and a plagiarism checker to ensure originality. It also provides resources like writing tips and sample essays, ensuring user data privacy and security.

articles.title: 'Interesting": Woman Flexes a Mini Washing Machine in a Bucket, Leaves South Africans Amped
articles.author: Johana Mukandila
articles.summary: Temu is offering mini washing machines that fit inside a bucket and use a USB power cord, designed for small laundry loads. The mini washing machines are being demonstrated for function and practicality on TikTok, gaining popularity in South Africa as a budget-friendly and space-saving solution.

articles.title: Ciara Kelly: It's refreshing to hear Gwyneth Paltrow talk openly about her waning libido – but ageing women can overcome this
articles.author: Ciara Kelly
articles.summary: Goop, Gwyneth Paltrow's lifestyle sales platform, sells a scented candle called 'This Smells Like My Vagina.' Goop also discusses sex toys and the benefits of orgasms.

articles.title: Artlist CEO: "Our mission is to keep exploring, questioning, and creating the best to
articles.author: Maayan Manela
articles.summary: Artlist, a company providing tools and content for video creators, has been developing new AI-driven products, features, and content libraries. Recently, Artlist launched a voiceover tool deeply rooted in AI. The company prioritizes quality and licensing for commercial use in its AI-generated content and strives for transparency with customers regarding its product roadmap.

articles.title: Official pre-order prices for new Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge including double storage deal
articles.author: Harriert Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Samsung has unveiled the Galaxy S25 Edge, a new flagship model featuring a slim design, Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, 200MP camera, and Galaxy AI. It is available for pre-order with deals including discounts, double storage, and trade-in offers through Samsung, Sky, and EE, with a release date set for May 30.

articles.title: Best 5 star washing machine in India 2025 for power saving and deep cleaning: Top 10 energy efficient washers to buy
articles.author: Kanika Budhiraja
articles.summary: The article showcases various 5-star rated washing machines from brands like LG, Samsung, Whirlpool, Panasonic, Bosch, and IFB, highlighting their features, capacity, and technologies. These include models with features like AI Direct Drive, Eco Bubble Technology, Ozone Technology, and hygiene steam, targeting different laundry needs and preferences for energy efficiency and cleaning performance.

articles.title: McAfee Rolls Out New Scam-Detecting Features, Adds Detection to Core Plans
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: A company is expanding its scam and deepfake detecting features, formerly an add-on service, beyond AI-powered devices. The features are described as new and improved, suggesting service launch or update.

articles.title: SanDisk Launches Faster, Smarter Storage For Power Users
articles.author: Boma Achenimie
articles.summary: SanDisk has launched the WD_BLACK SN8100 NVMe SSD, a high-performance internal storage solution utilizing PCIe Gen 5.0 technology. The new drive offers read speeds of up to 14,900 MB/s and storage capacities of up to 8TB, targeting gaming, content creation, and AI applications with enhanced power efficiency and thermal performance.

articles.title: Realme Neo 7 Turbo launch timeline confirmed: Expected to debut with Mediatek Dimensity 9400e chipset, 7000mAh battery, and more
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: Realme plans to introduce the Neo 7 Turbo smartphone in China this month, potentially featuring the Mediatek Dimensity 9400e processor and a 7000mAh battery. The phone is expected to be priced higher than the Realme Neo 7 and may target the gaming phone sector.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: Best UK pre-order deal on Sky Mobile
articles.author: Freelance Journalist
articles.summary: Sky Mobile has launched the cheapest contract deal for the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge, offering double storage, no upfront cost, and free Buds Pro. The new Samsung S25 Edge is an ultra-thin and light smartphone featuring Galaxy AI, with pre-orders now open; Samsung itself also offering the double storage deal. The phone is available in silver, 'icyblue' and 'jetblack' and has Gorilla glass to improve its strength.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: Sky Mobile launches cheapest UK deal with free Buds
articles.author: Stephen Hurrell
articles.summary: Sky Mobile has launched the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge with a contract deal that includes double storage, no upfront cost, and free Buds Pro. The phone is also available for pre-order from O2 and EE with varying monthly costs and upfront fees. The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge features new Gorilla Glass, Snapdragon 8 ® Elite Mobile Platform for Galaxy processor, 200MP camera and Galaxy AI.

articles.title: Best household essentials deals to expect for Amazon Prime Day 2025
articles.author: Sabrina Sahota
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day features discounts on various household essentials. Current deals include savings on Fairy non bio pods, Duracell batteries, Splesh toilet roll, baby wipes, and Ultrasun sunscreen. Amazon offers additional savings through its 'subscribe and save' service for products like laundry pods.

articles.title: Anti-Pervert Patent
articles.author: Timothy Winey
articles.summary: A new product concept, a child-protective shower safety system is discussed. The system aims to prevent unauthorized access to a shower using a pressure-sensitive floor plate that triggers alerts, environmental deterrents, digital logging, and emergency notification when the weight exceeds a calibrated threshold.

articles.title: Space-saving Ninja air fryer that makes cooking 'quick and easy' £70 off
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: The Ninja Double Stack XL Air Fryer is being sold at a discounted price of £199.99 on Amazon, down from its original price of £269.99. This model features a space-saving stackable design with two drawers and six cooking functions, available at Amazon, Ninja, Currys, and Argos.

articles.title: Atlus' new Persona teaser isn't about Persona 6, sorry
articles.author: Marc "Spidey" Griffin
articles.summary: Atlus has released a teaser for its new mobile game spinoff, Persona 5: The Phantom X. The teaser, posted on X, features the protagonist Wonder's glasses and the mantra 'Retake your desire!'

articles.title: Onscreen, Robots Are the Most Interesting People
articles.summary: Apple TV+ is premiering a new sci-fi comedy series called 'Murderbot'. The show features a sentient security unit who prefers watching streaming serials to interacting with the humans it is programmed to protect.

articles.title: 36 Beauty Must-Haves For Anyone Too Old For Gimmicks
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Laneige launched Neo Blurring Powder that absorbs oil and blurs pores. Olay introduced Super Serum Body Wash packed with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. E.l.f released Glow Reviver Melting Lip Balm which is tinted, moisturizing, buildable glosses.

articles.title: Top Tech: Samsung sale cuts Galaxy S25 to record low price as new Edge model drops
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slimmer version of the S25, available for pre-order at £1000+. Samsung is also cutting the cost of the Galaxy S25 range, offering the 128GB model for £599 and the 256GB model for £659.

articles.title: DoorDash launches drone deliveries in Charlotte
articles.author: Alexandria Sands
articles.summary: DoorDash, in partnership with Wing, has launched a drone delivery service in Charlotte, NC, initially covering a four-mile radius around The Arboretum Shopping Center. Customers can order from select restaurants via the DoorDash app, tracking their delivery which is estimated to take as little as 15 minutes. The companies plan to expand drone delivery to other Charlotte neighborhoods later this year.

articles.title: Amazon 'no fuss' pressure washer 'perfect for cars and patios' reduced from £90 to £56
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the Bosch EasyAquatak 110 High Pressure Washer from £90 to £56 as part of its Home and Garden Week sale. This compact pressure washer is suitable for cleaning patios, cars, and bikes. Alternative pressure washers, such as the McGregor Compact Pressure Washer at Argos and the Kärcher K2 Basic Corded Pressure Washer at B&Q, are also available at reduced prices.

articles.title: Microsoft Unveils Scrapped Concepts for Windows 11's Start Menu Redesign
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Microsoft is testing a new Start menu design for Windows 11 with Windows Insiders, focusing on customizability and speed while retaining user familiarity. The design team explored various concepts, including widget-like tiles and immersive landing pages, before settling on the current version. The final design emphasizes ease of access and personalization.

articles.title: After Having It For A Week, We Never Want To Be Without It: 30 Products Under $20 That Truly Make A Difference
articles.author: Ellie Jane Rudy
articles.summary: Black Girl Sunscreen SPF 30, a vegan and cruelty-free sunscreen designed for darker skin tones has been launched. Howard Feed-N-Wax Wood Polish and Conditioner, a beeswax and orange oil formula to polishes and protects wood surfaces has been introduced. CND SolarOil for brittle and split nails has also been launched.

articles.title: Polling giant Morning Consult is using AI to help dig through survey data
articles.author: Steven Melendez
articles.summary: Morning Consult has launched MorningConsult.AI, a new AI platform. This platform allows users to gain detailed insights from survey data by asking questions in plain language. The AI platform generates answers with data visualizations in seconds and it is currently in public beta testing.

articles.title: Primark drops new range of NUXE beauty dupes – including shimmery body oil and ‘honey ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Primark has introduced new skincare products that are copycats of NUXE, a French skincare brand known for its natural and sensorial products. These include a melting body balm with honey and botanical oils intended to nourish, repair, and soothe skin irritation.

articles.title: River Island's 'elegant' £42 dress 'just like' £135 Odd Muse version
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: River Island has introduced the Long Sleeve Square Neck Mini Dress, priced at £42 and available in multiple colors and sizes. The dress features a square neck, long sleeves, decorative pockets, and a mini hemline. It has gained popularity, with some comparing it to a similar dress from the luxury brand Odd Muse.

articles.title: Use These Best 7 Tongue Vibrators for Next-Level Clitoral Orgasms
articles.summary: The article introduces the "4-in-1 Tongue Thrusting Vibrator," a rose-shaped sex toy designed with a swirling tongue and lip-like edges that provides tongue-flicking motions. Additionally, the "Sovokn 5-in-1 Kiss Sucking Vibrator," is also introduced featuring a soft, kiss-like opening and a 360° flexible tongue with licking, sucking, and vibrating modes.

articles.title: Kyndryl and Microsoft Collaborate to Enable Adaptive Cloud Services
articles.author: Mansi Praharaj
articles.summary: Kyndryl has expanded its Kyndryl Distributed Cloud capabilities by using Microsoft's AI-powered adaptive cloud approach, aiming to innovate, modernize, and simplify business operations across hybrid, multicloud, edge, and IoT environments. The new services integrate with Microsoft Azure Arc, Azure Local, and Azure Cloud to support adaptability and enable a seamless transition.

articles.title: 8 years in, Nintendo president admits Switch 1 just isn't powerful enough for "new gameplay experiences" so it's time to move onto a "new standard" with Switch 2
articles.author: Scott McCrae
articles.summary: Nintendo's president, Shuntaro Furukawa, has addressed concerns regarding the perceived lack of innovation in the upcoming Nintendo Switch 2. This new console, successor to the Nintendo Switch, represents a departure from Nintendo's tradition of incorporating central gimmicks or innovations, making it the first console since the GameCube to primarily focus on being a better console.

articles.title: Taco Bell's crunchwrap is a fan favorite. Our version reigns supreme.
articles.author: Rey Lopez
articles.summary: Taco Bell introduced the Crunchwrap Supreme as a limited-time offering in 2005. Due to its success, it became a permanent menu item the following year. The Crunchwrap Supreme features seasoned beef, nacho cheese sauce, lettuce, tomatoes and a crunchy tostada, wrapped up in a flour tortilla that is then griddled on both sides to hold it all together.

articles.title: I've tried every ChatGPT prompt trick — this is the only one that gets me the best results
articles.summary: The article introduces "Prompt Dusting," a technique that combines the strengths of different AI chatbots like ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, Perplexity AI, DeepSeek, and Groq to improve results. By running prompts across multiple chatbots and comparing outputs, users can achieve more complete, creative, and accurate responses, leveraging each bot's unique capabilities for tasks like content creation and research. The author suggests mixing and matching the AI to discover the best hybrid system.

articles.title: Samsung may replace Galaxy S26 Plus variant with Edge next year
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge on May 13. Rumors are circulating that Samsung is developing the Samsung Galaxy S26 Edge, potentially replacing the Plus variant in the future S26 lineup. The company has already begun early development on the Galaxy S26 series.

articles.title: The step-hopping Dreame X50 Ultra Complete cleaned more of my house than any other robot vac
articles.summary: Dreame launched the X50 Ultra Complete, a robot vacuum and mop featuring retractable robotic legs for threshold navigation and an adjustable DToF sensor for low furniture cleaning. It includes features like 20,000Pa suction, a detangling brush system, and a self-cleaning dock with automatic mop drying and UV sterilization.

articles.title: Crown Point: Mel B opens Asda's first 'George' concept store in Leeds
articles.author: Dennis Morton
articles.summary: Asda launched its first stand-alone 'George' concept store in Leeds on May 10th. The new store is intended to replace existing Asda Living stores across the UK and features expanded collections and collaborations.

articles.title: Next's 'beautiful' £28 dress is 'perfect for summer and pretty good value'
articles.author: Mel King
articles.summary: Next is promoting the "V-Neck Ruffle Sleeve Mini Dress with Linen," retailing at £28 in various colors and sizes. The dress features a linen-blend material, v-neckline, short ruffled sleeves, and is machine washable. Customer reviews highlight its comfortable fit and suitability for summer, though some advise sizing down.

articles.title: Primark drops new range of NUXE beauty dupes – including shimmery body oil and ‘honey balm' for £29.50 less
articles.author: Senior Fabulous Digital Writer
articles.summary: Primark has introduced new body oil products as part of its Hey Hunny range: the £3.50 PS... Elixir Body Oil, the £3.50 PS... Hydrating Honey Body Mist, and a £3.50 body balm. These are marketed as dupes for NUXE and Tom Ford products, offering more affordable options.

articles.title: Google is preparing to unveil AI Agent at its annual developer conference
articles.author: Agency
articles.summary: Google is preparing to unveil new AI tools at its annual developer conference, including an AI agent designed for software developers and a voice mode integration of its Gemini AI Chatbot with Android XR glasses and headsets. The AI agent assists with tasks, coding, and documentation.

articles.title: Hogwarts Legacy Trailer Shows Switch vs Switch 2 Graphics Comparison
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Nintendo is preparing to launch the Nintendo Switch 2 console in under a month. The launch lineup will feature both major heavy-hitting games and several third-party ports and re-releases.

articles.title: Livingston's Young Minds Big Ideas to Host Statewide Shark Tank-Style Youth Competition
articles.summary: Young Minds Big Ideas (YMBI) is hosting a 'Shark Tank'-style competition where students pitch ventures aimed at solving real-world problems. The top teams will receive seed funding, mentorship, and support from the YMBI network to launch their ventures.

articles.title: This food giant's India AI teams are helping R&D, client experience
articles.author: Sujit John
articles.summary: Cargill has introduced a GenAI product enabling customers like McDonald's and KFC to explore persona-based product innovations and unique flavors. Furthermore, Cargill developed a ChatGPT client for sales executives, providing ingredient suggestions for bakeries and addressing challenges such as high moisture content in baking goods. Additionally, Cargill utilizes AI models to develop low-calorie sweeteners from commodities like corn.

articles.title: I didn't think I'd care about the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge – but then I held it next to my iPhone 16 Pro
articles.author: Axel Metz
articles.summary: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge is anticipated, noted for its thin design at 5.8mm and a price of $1,099.99 / £1,099 / AU$1,850. While it may not be the thinnest or the best value, hands-on experience is needed to fully assess it.

articles.title: Panasonic's new Lumix S1 II mirrorless camera is a video powerhouse with some serious upgrades, but it's pricey for a Lumix
articles.author: Timothy Coleman
articles.summary: Panasonic has unveiled the Lumix S1 II, a new mirrorless camera. This announcement represents a product introduction by Panasonic.

articles.title: Google reveals its new design for Android 16 and Wear OS 6
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Google revealed a new design for Android and WearOS. This represents a potential update or launch of new features for these operating systems.

articles.title: Scarlett Gasque Selects Centric PLM to Power Product Expansion and Digital Growth
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Scarlett Gasque has selected Centric PLM to drive business growth and facilitate product expansion into ready-to-wear apparel. The implementation of Centric PLM aims to streamline product development, manage supplier details, and improve overall visibility. Scarlett Gasque anticipates using Centric PLM to handle a significant number of SKUs for its Fall/Winter 2025 collection.

articles.title: Wellcron Healthcare's women's product brand "YEJIMINE" announced on the 14th that it has introduced ..
articles.author: Seo Jung-Won
articles.summary: Wellcron Healthcare's YEJIMINE brand has introduced the Daily Sense brand and launched its first product, "Daily Sense Safe Underwear." This new incontinence care product is designed for women and seniors, featuring a comfortable, absorbent, and deodorizing design. It is available in medium and large sizes via Coupang, Gmarket, and Naver smart stores.

articles.title: Sandisk Launches WD Black SN8100, World's Fastest PCIe Gen 5.0 SSD: Check Pricing And Availability
articles.author: Yashraj Verma
articles.summary: Sandisk has introduced the WD_BLACK SN8100 NVMe SSD, a new storage solution using PCIe Gen 5.0 technology, which provides speeds up to 14,900 MB/s read and 14,000 MB/s write. It will be available through retail partners and online stores in various storage sizes starting at INR 17,499 and including heatsink versions later this year.

articles.title: I Saw Ecovacs' New Self-Washing Robot Vacuums That Make Mopping Cleaner
articles.author: Ajay Kumar
articles.summary: Ecovacs has launched the Deebot X9 Pro Omni and T80 Omni robot mops, featuring the Ozmo Roller Mop technology with a self-washing system and separate clean/dirty water tanks. The new mops address hygiene concerns of traditional mops and offer improved cleaning performance with increased pressure compared to standard robot mops.

articles.title: 37 Products Worth Every Penny You Spend
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Miss Mouth's Messy Eater Stain Treater Spray erases stains from fabrics, Nivea Q10 lightweight gel cream plumps and moisturizes skin, Colorescience brush-on mineral powder offers sun protection and sheer foundation, and Juno & Co.'s Clean 10 Cleansing Balm removes makeup. These products provide solutions for stain removal, skincare, sun protection, and makeup removal, respectively.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: Preorder and Get Double the Storage and a $50 Gift Card for Free
articles.author: Chris Reed
articles.summary: Samsung announced the Galaxy S25 Edge, an ultra-slim flagship smartphone, set to release on May 30 for $1099.99. The device is 5.8mm thick and weighs 163 grams. Preorders are currently live with a promotion offering double storage and a $50 Amazon gift card.

articles.title: Google launches The Android Show
articles.author: Manila Bulletin
articles.summary: Google will unveil its newest products at the I/O event, including updates to Android. The Android Show will highlight features for Android 16, such as Material 3 Expressive.

articles.title: 真我Neo7 Turbo本月发布
articles.author: 经济观察报
articles.summary: Realme (真我) is launching a new product, the Realme Neo7 Turbo, as the first Turbo product in the Neo series. This product will feature a new design exploration and is positioned as a 'powerful small transparent'. The official launch is scheduled for this month.

articles.title: Horizon Zero Dawn 3 scheduled for 2027 as a cross-gen PS6 game claims rumour
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Sony is planning to launch the PS6.

articles.title: Galaxy S26+ discontinued
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung, implied by Galaxy S25 Edge, unveiled the Galaxy S25 Edge. The unveiling occurred in South Korea. Early reports followed the unveiling.

articles.title: Audi's flagship EV getting cheaper with new base model
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Audi launched a new entry-level e-tron GT. This launch occurs despite the introduction of the A6 e-tron.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 review: Everyday smarts, familiar looks
articles.author: Mansi Taneja
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Series, highlighting AI-driven features and One UI 7. The S25 includes features like Now Brief, an AI-powered camera, and the Generative Edit tool. This series is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 4 or Exynos 2500 and includes Galaxy AI-powered features like Now Bar.

articles.title: Android 16 Is Getting a Facelift, and Gemini Is Rolling Onto More Google Platforms
articles.author: Julian Chokkattu
articles.summary: Google is releasing details about upcoming features for Android 16, including a redesign using Material 3 Expressive. These features are expected to arrive on Pixel phones, potentially the Pixel 10 series, later this summer, with a broader Android update anticipated in June.

articles.title: Yellow Cab Pizza brings full-service dining with new SM Grand Central Store
articles.author: Business Mirror
articles.summary: Yellow Cab Pizza has launched its newest branch at SM Grand Central in Caloocan, introducing a new "Hot & Fresh dining experience". The branch features seated, from-table ordering and a modern interior design to offer a more comfortable, sit-down service.

articles.title: Airbnb Expands Services Beyond Stays with Major App Revamp
articles.summary: Airbnb has revamped its app and services, introducing features that enable users to book experiences and services along with their accommodation. The update includes a redesigned experiences section offering tours, classes, and activities, as well as the ability to book add-on services like private chefs and personal trainers. This expansion aims to broaden Airbnb's offerings beyond property rentals.

articles.title: Dell XPS 13 review: This compact powerhouse packs marathon battery and Snapdragon's punch
articles.author: Live Mint
articles.summary: Dell has released the XPS 13 with Snapdragon X Elite. This ultra-portable laptop features a stunning OLED display and delivers all-day battery life, making it suitable for everyday tasks.

articles.title: Google introduces new Android security features to protect you from online scams
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Google has announced a suite of new security features for Android devices. These features are designed to protect users from scams, theft, and other security threats. The announcement was made ahead of Google I/O 2025.

articles.title: Amazon Fresh coming to The Clove in Buffalo Grove
articles.author: Daily Herald
articles.summary: Amazon is introducing its new grocery service, Amazon Fresh, to The Clove in Buffalo Grove.

articles.title: OLIPOP's LA Pop-Up Is Instagram Bait—And That's The Point
articles.author: Kaleigh Moore
articles.summary: OLIPOP launched a drive-through pop-up experience in Los Angeles to celebrate the return of its Orange Cream flavor. The event featured inventive OLIPOP mocktails and limited-edition merchandise, and a virtual drive-through was launched online. The activation aimed to blend nostalgia, wellness, and viral culture to drive consumer engagement.

articles.title: Boomi launches agentic AI tools, announces AWS collaboration
articles.author: Info World
articles.summary: Boomi introduced new products and partnerships at Boomi World conference. These advancements are aimed at furthering the company's enterprise automation AI strategy and reflect a commitment to business transformation through a unified, open, and AI-native platform.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Galaxy S25 Edge with Advanced Features
articles.author: The Arabian Post
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a new flagship smartphone. The device features a 5.8mm titanium body and is designed to set a new benchmark in smartphone technology.

articles.title: DuPont Unveils Brand Identity for Qnity, Future Electronics Spin-Off
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: DuPont unveiled the branding for Qnity, a planned independent Electronics public company created through the spin-off of its Electronics business. Qnity's branding reinforces innovation and partnership to make tomorrow's technologies possible.

articles.title: Hori Switch 2 Accessories Include The Console's First Third-Party Pro Controller
articles.author: Gamespot
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2 is launching on June 5 with accessories. Nintendo, GameStop, and Hori will provide first-party gadgets and affordable alternatives for the new console. Hori offers officially licensed carrying cases and accessories.

articles.title: LG G5 Series Review: Best OLED TV I've Ever Tested
articles.author: system
articles.summary: The LG G5 Series OLED TV sets a new standard for high-end TVs. This launch indicates advancement in TV technology.

articles.title: DailyObjects POP GaN Charger Review: A Foldable, Flashy Fix For Your Flagship?
articles.author: Sahil Mohan Gupta
articles.summary: DailyObjects launched a new product line called 'POP' GaN adapters, featuring foldable Indian pins and GaN5 technology for efficient charging. The series includes 33W, 45W, and 67W models with multiple ports and a focus on design, offering a solution for charging multiple devices with intelligent power distribution.
